pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pynhc2License: MIT## Usage### Create a NHC2 object```NHC2(address, username, password, port, ca_path, switches_as_lights)```* __address__ - IP or host of the connected controller * __username__ - The UUID of the profile* __password__ - The password* __port__ - (optional) The MQTT port. Default = 8883* __ca_path__ - (optional) Path of the CA file. Default = included CA file.* __switches_as_lights__ - (optional) socket and switched-generic show up as lights. example: ``` coco = NHC2('192.168.1.2', 'abcdefgh-ijkl-mnop-qrst-uvwxyz012345', 'secret_password') ``` ### What is supported?light, socket, switched-generic, dimmer### What now?
